long_description: Built with a smooth-riding steel frame, the 27-speed GT Corsa 2.0 Bike is designed for commutes, tours and weekend fitness rides. Double-butted chromoly steel frame supplies a buttery-smooth ride quality while remaining stiff and responsive. 27 gear combinations offer lots of options for climbs, sprints and flats. Frame eyelets make it easy to attach fenders or a rear rack (not included) for enhanced utility. Vittoria Zaffiro tires roll smoothly and grip well in corners for good all-around performance. Specs on the GT Corsa 2.0 Bike are subject to change. Closeout.
short_description: Built with a smooth-riding steel frame, the 27-speed GT Corsa 2.0 Bike is designed for commutes, tours and weekend fitness rides.
